title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Exploring Digital Technology and Learner Identity in Project-Based Science

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of digital tool usage on scientific problem-solving processes from an identity perspective

Learners create a portfolio with ≥3 reflective case studies evaluating their digital technology utilization (e.g., collaboration tools, data analysis tools) during project collaboration. They achieve 'average' or higher ratings in ≥4 of 5 institutional rubric items
Submit a report critiquing generational stereotypes about digital technology access and explaining diversity in science learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
